explains: n. 种族渊源，种族特点

sentences.en: The government uses a classification system that includes both race and ethnicity.
sentences.cn: 政府采用一种既包括人种又包括种族的类别体系。

sentences.en: Keyssar also scrutinizes unemployment patterns according to skill level, ethnicity, race, age, class, and gender.
sentences.cn: 凯萨还根据技能水平、种族、年龄、阶级和性别详细分析了失业模式。

sentences.en: He said his ethnicity had not been important to him.
sentences.cn: 他说他的种族渊源对他向来都不重要。
